pages.text: Enriched uranium is produced in a multi-step process. First, smelt uranium blocks in a nuclear furnace to get a block of salted uranium.
Put the salted uranium block in a $(l:alexscavesenriched:resources/centrifuge_entry)Centrifuge$(/l) and wait (a while) to get an enriched uranium chunk, which you can craft into enriched uranium.
Enriched uranium rods glow, inflict irradiated II to nearby entities, and can be acid logged. Can be used to tame and breed Tremorzilla
The block of enriched uranium glows and inflicts irradiated II to nearby entities. It cannot be moved by pistons nor be blown up by TNT.
